  • Fprint

    • logger.js

    /* eslint no-console: 0 */
import chalk from 'chalk';

const ENABLE_AUTH_LOGGING = process.env.ENABLE_AUTH_LOGGING === 'true';

if (!ENABLE_AUTH_LOGGING) {
  console.log(`${chalk.bgWhite.bold('[AUTH]')} : Logs are disabled.`);
}

/**
 * If logs are enabled in the .env file - we log
 * We log in a way that the user knows that it's the auth module logging.
 * @param  {String} string what should be printed
 */
const print = (string) => {
  if (ENABLE_AUTH_LOGGING) {
    console.log(`${chalk.bgWhite.bold('[AUTH]')} ${string}`);
  }
};

export const error = (message) => print(chalk.bgRed(message));

export const warn = (message) => print(chalk.bgRed(message));

export const success = (message) => print(chalk.bgGreen(message));

export const info = (message) => print(chalk.bgCyan(message));

export const plain = (message) => print(message);
